data.name: TokenAlreadyUsed
data.value: The token has already been used

data.name: HasPendingActivationEmail
data.value: An activation email is already pending. Please check your inbox

data.name: DuplicateLoginAttempt
data.value: Your login is already in progress. Please try again later

data.name: PasswordEmailMismatch
data.value: The email and password you entered do not match. Please try again.

data.name: AccountNotActivated
data.value: Your account is not activated yet. Please check your email to complete the activation.

data.name: AccountLocked
data.value: Your account has been locked, please contact support

data.name: AllTenantsDisabled
data.value: Your account is associated with tenants that are all currently disabled. Please contact support

data.name: TenantUserDisabled
data.value: Your access to this tenant has been disabled. Please contact the tenant administrator

data.name: TenantDisabled
data.value: This tenant has been disabled. Please contact the platform administrator

data.name: AccountSuspended
data.value: Your account has been temporarily suspended. Please contact support

data.name: AccountDeleted
data.value: This account has been deleted. Access is no longer available

data.name: AccountBanned
data.value: Your account has been permanently banned due to policy violations

data.name: TenantUserRecordNotFound
data.value: User record not found in the current tenant. Please verify your account

data.name: OAuthUserProfileFetchFailed
data.value: Failed to fetch user profile from provider

data.name: OAuthUserProfileNotExists
data.value: OAuth user profile does not exist

data.name: AuthorizationFailure
data.value: You do not have permission to perform this action

data.name: InvalidAbacPolicyRule
data.value: Invalid or unsafe ABAC policy rule

data.name: RefreshTokenExpired
data.value: Your session has expired. Please log in again

data.name: AccountNotActivatedOrInvitationPending
data.value: Your account is not activated or the invitation has not been confirmed

data.name: AbacPolicyDisabled
data.value: The policy is currently disabled. Please enable it before making changes

data.name: AbacPolicyEnableSuccessfully
data.value: The policy has been successfully enabled

data.name: AbacPolicyHasBeenReplaced
data.value: This policy has been replaced by a newer version and cannot be re-enabled or edit

data.name: AccountExistsButNotActivated
data.value: This account already exists but has not been activated yet. Please check your email or resend the activation link

data.name: AccountAlreadyActivated
data.value: This account has already been activated. Please log in directly

data.name: TooFrequentActivationAttempt
data.value: You are trying to activate your account too frequently. Please try again later

data.name: AccountRegistered
data.value: Account registered successfully, an activation link has been sent to your email, please verify to complete registration, the link is valid for {0} minutes

data.name: AccountActivatedSuccessfully
data.value: Your account has been successfully activated. You may now log in securely

data.name: DuplicateRegisterAttempt
data.value: Your registration is already in progress. Please try again later

data.name: TenantNotFound
data.value: The specified tenant could not be found. Please verify your selection or contact support

data.name: UserEmailUpdateVerificationLinkSent
data.value: A verification link has been sent to your new email address, please check your inbox. The link is valid for {0} minutes

data.name: UserProfileUnchanged
data.value: No changes detected in user profile

data.name: EmailAlreadyUsed
data.value: This email address is already in use

data.name: EmailResent
data.value: Activation email has been resent. The link is valid for {0} minutes

data.name: TooFrequentEmailRequest
data.value: Too many email requests. Please try again later

data.name: AccountActivationInstruction
data.value: Please click the button below to activate your account.

data.name: AccountActivationFooter
data.value: This email was sent automatically. Please do not reply.

data.name: AccountActivationValidityNotice
data.value: This link is valid for {0} minutes.

data.name: AccountActivationManualLinkInstruction
data.value: If the button doesn't work, please copy the following link and open it in your browser:

data.name: EmailUpdateEmailSendingInstruction
data.value: You are changing your account email from {0} to {1}. Please click the button below to confirm your update.

data.name: EmailUpdateEmailSendingValidityNotice
data.value: This link will expire in {0} minutes.

data.name: EmailUpdateEmailSendingManualLinkInstruction
data.value: If the button does not work, you can also copy the following link into your browser:

data.name: EmailUpdateEmailSendingFooter
data.value: This email was sent automatically by the system. Please do not reply directly.

data.name: PasswordMustBeAtLeast8Characters
data.value: Password must be at least 8 characters

data.name: PasswordMustContainUppercase
data.value: Password must contain an uppercase letter

data.name: PasswordMustContainLowercase
data.value: Password must contain a lowercase letter

data.name: PasswordMustContainSpecialCharacter
data.value: Password must contain a special character

data.name: NameMustBeAtLeast1Characters
data.value: Name must be at least 1 character long

data.name: IsStaySignedInIsRequired
data.value: The stay signed in option must be specified

data.name: AbacPolicyRuleJsonRequired
data.value: Rule JSON must not be empty

data.name: PasswordMustBeDifferentFromCurrent
data.value: New password must be different from current password

data.name: PhoneAndCountryCodeMustBeTogether
data.value: Phone number and country code must be provided together

data.name: NewEmailMustBeDifferentFromCurrent
data.value: New email must be different from current email
